description: Their new eco-conscious plant-based dyes bring this classic men’s long-sleeved crew closer to nature and create a one-of-a-kind look for each shirt. Couple that with the 100% responsibly sourced Merino wool fabric for breathability and temperature control and the flatlock seams to reduce chafing, and your unique look is also functional and comfortable.
name: Smartwool Classic Thermal (250) Plant-Based Dye Merino Base Layer Logo Crew - Mens
